backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling access control, user approval, and user profiles with functions for authorization and storing match-related types. Includes invite-only mode logic and profile CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, tests, and confidence for regression and schema mismatch fixes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of many frontend files to their descriptions for build planning and documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React app routing configuration using TanStack Router with layout, auth gate, and all mode pages.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaBallButto: UI component rendering a clickable APA ball button with state-based styles and accessibility labels.
frontend/src/components/apa/apaBallStyle: Defines ball state types, value rules, and helpers to compute total points per rack by player and dead balls.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaRackScori: Interactive rack scoring UI for APA 9-ball, managing ball states, innings, defensive shots, and auto-dead logic when the 9-ball is pocketed.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaResultsSu: Displays end-of-match results including winner, match points, skill levels, points earned, defensive shots, innings, and PPI for both players.
frontend/src/components/apa/RealApaMatch: Form for creating or editing official APA match logs with validation for scores, innings, defensive shots, and skill-level-based targets.
frontend/src/components/apa/useApaInning: Hook managing inning flow, active player, inning counts, and transitions based on balls scored.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication and access-control wrapper handling login, approval, admin checks, and invite-only mode before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button enabling login/logout using Internet Identity with automatic session clearing and query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting users to set up or edit their profile with name and optional APA skill level, using profile-fetch and save hooks.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout with header, footer, navigation buttons, login, admin access, and profile dialogs.
frontend/src/components/matches/DeleteMa: Button that opens a confirmation dialog and deletes a match, then navigates or triggers a callback.
frontend/src/components/matches/EndMatch: Dialog to confirm ending and saving a session, handling async completion and error toasts.
frontend/src/components/matches/MatchSum: Card displaying match mode, date, and summary text with logic for APA, gifts, and straight-shot modes.
frontend/src/components/navigation/ModeC: Clickable card with icon and description that navigates to start a new game mode.
frontend/src/components/players/ApaAggre: Charts showing APA PPI and match result trends with rolling averages using Recharts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and auth-client configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating match data, user profiles, and object ball counts via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/accepting-gifts/accepti: Session logic for adjusting game state, applying attempt results, and advancing sets with clamped ball counts.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaAggregateStats.t: Extracts APA match stats, computes PPI, determines outcomes, and generates sorted data series and win rates.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaEqualizer.ts: Defines APA skill levels, points‑to‑win mapping, and helpers for formatting and validation.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaMatchPoints.ts: Defines the APA 9‑ball match point conversion chart and thresholds for each skill level.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaScoring.ts: Utilities for rack scoring, validation, PPI calculation, and aggregating player stats across racks.
Derives official APA match outcomes using skill levels and scores, with fallback to stored didWin.
frontend/src/lib/apa/officialApaPpi.ts: Parses score fields and computes official APA PPI with validation and formatting.
frontend/src/lib/matches/effectiveMatchD: Parses or formats match dates, preferring official APA date strings and falling back to nanosecond timestamps.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuilders.t: Builds official APA match log records, deriving outcomes and returning a matchId and MatchLogRecord; re-exports other builders.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuildersOr: Contains builders for APA 9-ball, Accepting Gifts, and other match types, constructing MatchLogRecord objects with stats and metadata.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/accepting-gifts/Accep: Manages Accepting Gifts game state, session persistence, scoring logic, and saving matches to the backend.
Displays rules, setup, scoring, and tips for the Accepting Gifts drill.
Provides a form to start an Accepting Gifts session, manage baseline ball count, and initialize session state.
Manages an APA practice game's state, rack scoring, completion detection, and saving to backend or session storage.
frontend/src/pages/apa/PracticeStartPage: Collects player names and skill levels, builds initial practice game state, and stores it before navigating to the game screen.
frontend/src/pages/apa/RealApaMatchEditP: Loads an existing official APA match and displays a form to edit its data, redirecting if the match is missing.
frontend/src/pages/apa/RealApaMatchPlace: Provides a form for creating an official APA match log after the match is completed.
frontend/src/pages/auth/AccessNotAllowed: Shows an invite‑only access message and allows users to request approval to use the app.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchDetailsP: Displays detailed information for a specific match, including APA stats and mode‑specific breakdowns.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchHistoryP: Shows a sortable and filterable list of all past matches with navigation to details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home page with navigation cards for match modes and a button linking to match history.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OwnerApprovalsP: Admin page to review, approve, reject, or bulk-reject user approval requests and toggle invite‑only mode.
frontend/src/pages/players/PlayerAggrega: Displays aggregated APA player stats, including win rates, counts, averages, and charts for selected players.
frontend/src/pages/straight-shot/Straigh: Runs the Straight Shot drill session, tracks in‑progress game state, computes scores, and saves the match.
Static panel explaining objectives and rules for the Straight Shot drill.
Start screen for the Straight Shot drill where users enter details, view moving averages, and begin a session.
frontend/src/utils/errorText.ts: Utility to extract readable error messages from various error shapes, including nested backend errors.
frontend/src/utils/playerName.ts: Provides helpers for normalizing and comparing player names case‑insensitively.
frontend/src/utils/playerRoutes.ts: Builds URL paths for player aggregate stats pages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters via query strings or hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project state, app summary, architectural notes, and known issues for an APA pool practice and match-tracking app.
